com.epoch
Class HWSetDescr

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.HWSetDescr
All Implemented Interfaces:
HWSetConstants
public class HWSetDescr
extends Object
implements HWSetConstants

Holds the descriptive attributes of an assignment. Scope: UI, Session, Data. Sessions: HWCreateSession, HWSession.
